name: Finding Home (iMattRoman)
description:
Earth is doomed. Its your job as Earth's premiere astronaut explorer to find a new home for all of humanity. Explore the universe, upgrade your ship, manage your resources and shoot asteroids in search of a suitable replacement earth. Visit weird alien planets and research their world to upgrade your own ship.

This game was created for the 2019 Global Game Jam, the theme was "What Home Means To You". Here is the original Global Game Jam page.

~~~~~~~~~CONTROLS~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

WASD - Move

SPACE - Shoot

E (hold) - Scan Planets

SHIFT (hold) - Return to Earth
